text: "Walk" is the fourth single off of American rock band Pantera's sixth studio album Vulgar Display of Power. The song was released in 1993. The song was able to make it to #35 on the UK Singles Chart. Rolling Stone ranked the song #29 on their list of "100 Greatest Heavy Metal Songs of All Time". After the band was finished touring for their album Cowboys From Hell, their friends started say that the fame was going to their heads. Lead singer Phil Anselmo told them to "Take your fucking attitude and take a fuckin' walk with that. Keep that shit away from me". American professional wrestler Rob Van Dam used the song during his time in Extreme Championship Wrestling (ECW) and All Elite Wrestling (AEW). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1993 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Pantera songs Category:Avenged Sevenfold songs
title: Walk (song)
